name: Galactic Bulwark Strike
description:
• This is a small game that was made in my spare time with lots and lots of love.
  • Expect a fun, run-based game perfect to play in short sessions.
  • Can be speedrun.
  • It's harder than it looks.


  • Physics-based mix of shoot'em up and arkanoid.
  • Arcade score-chasing game.
  • Spend your earned score points to upgrade your powerups.
  • Easy to learn, really hard to master.


  • Awesome Synth/Retro a e s t h e t i c
  • 4 really unique enemies.
  • 3 Bulwark bosses.
  • 12 powerups which can be upgraded, including Kinetic Gun, Homing Missiles, Electric Ball, Wall Lasers...
  • 3 boost types that improve your stats.
  • Endless mode after main game is completed.
  • High-score and speedrun leaderboards.
  • Steam achievements.
